value.string:
"""
 This script just returns what the user entered in
 the fast input form, searches for the product whose
 reference or title has been just entered and updates
 the total price and the stock corresponding to the 
 product
 """
 result = [x.getObject() for x in context.SaleOrder_getFastInputSaleOrderLineList(lines_num=12, **kw)]
 
 request= context.REQUEST
 
 portal = context.getPortalObject()
 Base_translateString = portal.Base_translateString
 total_price = 0.0
 for line in listbox:
 if line.has_key('listbox_key') and (line['title'] or line['reference'] not in ('', None)):
 product = context.portal_catalog.getResultValue(
 portal_type=['Product','Service'],
 title=line['title'],
 reference=line['reference'])
 line_id = line['listbox_key']
 cell = result[int(line_id)-1]
 cell.setResourceValue(product) 
 line["quantity_unit"] = cell.getQuantityUnit()
 line["resource_relative_url"] = cell.getResourceRelativeUrl()
 request.form["field_listbox_resource_relative_url_new_%s"%line_id]=cell.getResourceRelativeUrl()
 kw["field_listbox_resource_relative_url_new_%s"%line_id]=cell.getResourceRelativeUrl()
 request.set("field_listbox_resource_relative_url_new_%s"%line_id,cell.getResourceRelativeUrl())
 request.form["field_listbox_reference_new_%s"%line_id] = product.getReference() or ''
 request.form["field_listbox_title_new_%s"%line_id] = product.getTitle()
 request.form["field_listbox_quantity_unit_new_%s"%line_id] = cell.getQuantityUnit()
 
 if line["variation_category_list"]!='' and product.getPortalType()=='Product' and line['quantity'] <= product.getAvailableInventory(
 section_uid=context.getSourceSectionValue().getUid(),
 variation_text='variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"]):
 supply_cell_list = product.default_ssl.contentValues(portal_type='Sale Supply Cell')
 for supply_cell in supply_cell_list:
 if supply_cell.getVariationCategoryList()[0]=='variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"]:
 line["total_price"] = line['quantity'] * supply_cell.getBasePrice()
 request.form["field_listbox_total_price_new_%s"%line_id] = line['total_price'] 
 request.form["field_listbox_getAvailableInventory_new_%s"%line_id] = product.getAvailableInventory(
 section_uid=context.getSourceSectionValue().getUid(),
 variation_text='variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"])
 request.form['field_listbox_inventory_new_%s'%line_id] = product.getInventory(
 section_uid=context.getSourceSectionValue().getUid(),
 variation_text='variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"])
 request.form["field_listbox_getCurrentInventory_new_%s"%line_id] = product.getCurrentInventory(
 section_uid=context.getSourceSectionValue().getUid(),
 variation_text='variation/%s'%line["variation_category_list"])
 total_price +=line['total_price']
 request.form["field_my_total_price"] = total_price
 
 elif line["variation_category_list"]=='' and product.getPortalType()=='Product' and line['quantity'] <= product.getAvailableInventory(
 section_uid=context.getSourceSectionValue().getUid()):
 line["total_price"] = line['quantity'] * cell.getPrice()
 request.form["field_listbox_total_price_new_%s"%line_id] = line['total_price']
 request.form["field_listbox_getAvailableInventory_new_%s"%line_id] = product.getAvailableInventory(
 section_uid=context.getSourceSectionValue().getUid())
 request.form['field_listbox_inventory_new_%s'%line_id] = product.getInventory(
 section_uid=context.getSourceSectionValue().getUid())
 request.form["field_listbox_getCurrentInventory_new_%s"%line_id] = product.getCurrentInventory(
 section_uid=context.getSourceSectionValue().getUid(),)
 total_price +=line['total_price']
 request.form["field_my_total_price"] = total_price
 elif product.getPortalType()=='Service':
 line["total_price"] = line['quantity'] * cell.getPrice()
 request.form["field_listbox_total_price_new_%s"%line_id] = line['total_price']
 total_price +=line['total_price']
 request.form["field_my_total_price"] = total_price
 else:
 request.set('portal_status_message', 
 Base_translateString('Quantity Asked For Line %s Not Available In Inventory'%line['listbox_key'])) 
 
 context.Base_updateDialogForm(listbox=listbox,update=1,kw=kw)
 return context.SaleOrder_viewSaleOrderFastInputDialog(listbox=listbox,**kw)
